Title: Fishing King Crab
Descriptions:
Ahoy, Matey!

Impressive anglin’, very impressive.
I be havin’ a special request for ye’ teday, a personal favour, ye’ might say…

Ye’ know about my little… digestive problem I been endurin’, well, a friend o’ mine, a local witchdoctor has sworn te’ me that if I chew the meat from the dominant claw of a Berezhki King Crab fer 3 days, me Bali Belly will flee from me, like the reason from a drunk man.

I’ll be payin’ ye’ a special price fer this personal favour: ₽3500!

I’ll be eternally grateful, Matey!

Tight lines and hurry on back, Matey!


Travel to Cape Glova
Catch 1 King Crab

Catch 1 King Crab
